0.text: Innate: Ornn increases his  bonus armor,  bonus magic resistance and  bonus health by 10% from all sources, further increased by 4% each time he upgrades a Mythic item into a Masterwork item.
0.html: Innate: Ornn increases his  bonus armor,  bonus magic resistance and  bonus health by 10% from all sources, further increased by 4% each time he upgrades a Mythic item into a Masterwork item.

1.text: Innate - Living Forge: Ornn can purchase non-consumable items from anywhere on the field by forging them himself, and is also presented a Forge Menu with his recommended items to select to be forged.  Forging takes 4 seconds and the process is  interrupted if Ornn takes damage from enemy  champions or  turrets, disabling Living Forge for a few seconds.  Gold is only expended upon completing the forge.
1.html: Innate - Living Forge: Ornn can purchase non-consumable items from anywhere on the field by forging them himself, and is also presented a Forge Menu with his recommended items to select to be forged. Forging takes 4 seconds and the process is interrupted if Ornn takes damage from enemy champions or turrets, disabling Living Forge for a few seconds. Gold is only expended upon completing the forge.

2.text:
Innate - Master Craftsman: When Ornn reaches level 13, the Mythic item he owns or purchases is upgraded for free. Additionally, for each level after 13 (levels 14, 15, 16 and 17, excluding 18), Ornn can upgrade one of an allied champion's Mythic item by selecting them within 600 range. Each Masterwork item has roughly  1000-worth of additional stats.
Masterwork items:
Assassin:  Draktharr's Shadowcarver,  Sandshrike's Claw,  Syzygy.
Fighter:  Ceaseless Hunger,  Deicide,  Dreamshatter,  Infinity Force.
Mage:  Caesura,  Eternal Winter,  Eye of Luden,  Icathia's Curse,  Liandry's Lament,  Upgraded Aeropack,  Vespertide.
Marksman:  Bloodward,  Typhoon,  Wyrmfallen Sacrifice.
Support:  Equinox,  Reliquary of the Golden Dawn,  Seat of Command,  Shurelya's Requiem,  Starcaster.
Tank:  Forgefire Crest,  Rimeforged Grasp,  Turbocharged Hexperiment.
2.html:
Innate - Master Craftsman: When Ornn reaches level 13, the Mythic item he owns or purchases is upgraded for free. Additionally, for each level after 13 (levels 14, 15, 16 and 17, excluding 18), Ornn can upgrade one of an allied champion's Mythic item by selecting them within 600 range. Each Masterwork item has roughly 1000-worth of additional stats.

  • Masterwork items:
    • Assassin: Draktharr's Shadowcarver, Sandshrike's Claw, Syzygy.
    • Fighter: Ceaseless Hunger, Deicide, Dreamshatter, Infinity Force.
    • Mage: Caesura, Eternal Winter, Eye of Luden, Icathia's Curse, Liandry's Lament, Upgraded Aeropack, Vespertide.
    • Marksman: Bloodward, Typhoon, Wyrmfallen Sacrifice.
    • Support: Equinox, Reliquary of the Golden Dawn, Seat of Command, Shurelya's Requiem, Starcaster.
    • Tank: Forgefire Crest, Rimeforged Grasp, Turbocharged Hexperiment.

3.text: Innate - Temper: Ornn's basic attacks against  Brittle enemies  knock them back a short distance.
3.html: Innate - Temper: Ornn's basic attacks against Brittle enemies knock them back a short distance.

4.text: Ornn's and allies'  immobilizing effects against enemies afflicted by Brittle will consume the debuff to deal 10% − 18% (based on Ornn's level) of the target's maximum health as bonus magic damage, capped at 250 against  monsters, and last 30% longer (if applicable).
4.html: Ornn's and allies' immobilizing effects against enemies afflicted by Brittle will consume the debuff to deal 10% − 18% (based on Ornn's level) of the target's maximum health as bonus magic damage, capped at 250 against monsters, and last 30% longer (if applicable).

0.text: Active: Ornn sends a fissure in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies hit and  slows them by 40% for 2 seconds.
0.html: Active: Ornn sends a fissure in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies hit and slows them by 40% for 2 seconds.

1.text: The fissure stops at maximum range or 200 units behind the first enemy champion struck. After 1.125-seconds, a magma pillar then erupts to  knock aside enemies, though not through terrain, and linger as impassible terrain for 4 seconds.
1.html: The fissure stops at maximum range or 200 units behind the first enemy champion struck. After 1.125-seconds, a magma pillar then erupts to knock aside enemies, though not through terrain, and linger as impassible terrain for 4 seconds.

2.text: The pillar will not expire while Ornn is  charging.
2.html: The pillar will not expire while Ornn is charging.

0.text: Active: Ornn marches in the target direction for 0.75 seconds, gaining  displacement immunity, becoming  unable to act, and reducing his  movement speed by 35% for the duration.
0.html: Active: Ornn marches in the target direction for 0.75 seconds, gaining displacement immunity, becoming unable to act, and reducing his  movement speed by 35% for the duration.

1.text: Over the march he belches fire over a cone in front of him, dealing magic damage every 0.15 seconds to enemies hit. The final gout of flame will apply  Brittle for 3 seconds.
1.html: Over the march he belches fire over a cone in front of him, dealing magic damage every 0.15 seconds to enemies hit. The final gout of flame will apply Brittle for 3 seconds.

2.text: Bellows Breath has a minimum damage threshold, which is also the damage dealt to  minions.  Monsters take modified damage as well.
2.html: Bellows Breath has a minimum damage threshold, which is also the damage dealt to minions. Monsters take modified damage as well.

0.text: Active: Ornn  charges in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies he passes through, stopping upon colliding with terrain.
0.html: Active: Ornn charges in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies he passes through, stopping upon colliding with terrain.

1.text: If Ornn collides with terrain during the charge, he creates a shockwave that  knocks up nearby enemies,  stuns them for 1.25 seconds, and deals damage to them if they weren't already hit during the charge.
1.html: If Ornn collides with terrain during the charge, he creates a shockwave that knocks up nearby enemies, stuns them for 1.25 seconds, and deals damage to them if they weren't already hit during the charge.

2.text: The shockwave destructs the pillar formed by  Volcanic Rupture and partially destroys terrain created by enemy  champions.
2.html: The shockwave destructs the pillar formed by Volcanic Rupture and partially destroys terrain created by enemy champions.

0.text: Active: Ornn sounds his horn over the cast time, summoning a lava elemental at maximum range from the target direction that stampedes towards his casting position at increasing speed. The elemental deals magic damage to enemies it passes through and  slows them for 2 seconds, with the  slow scaling with the distance travelled, down to a minimum of 10%.
0.html: Active: Ornn sounds his horn over the cast time, summoning a lava elemental at maximum range from the target direction that stampedes towards his casting position at increasing speed. The elemental deals magic damage to enemies it passes through and slows them for 2 seconds, with the slow scaling with the distance travelled, down to a minimum of 10%.

1.text: Call of the Forge God can be recast after 1.25 seconds while the elemental is active.
1.html: Call of the Forge God can be recast after 1.25 seconds while the elemental is active.

2.text: Recast: Ornn  dashes in the target direction, though not through terrain. If Ornn collides with the elemental, he sends it stampeding in the new direction. The elemental deals the same damage to enemies it passes through,  knocks them up and  stuns them for 1 second, reduced to 0.5 seconds after the first enemy  champion hit.
2.html: Recast: Ornn dashes in the target direction, though not through terrain. If Ornn collides with the elemental, he sends it stampeding in the new direction. The elemental deals the same damage to enemies it passes through, knocks them up and stuns them for 1 second, reduced to 0.5 seconds after the first enemy champion hit.

3.text: Each pass applies  Brittle to targets for 3 seconds and can affect enemies only once. The elemental briefly grants  sight around its trajectory as it travels.
3.html: Each pass applies Brittle to targets for 3 seconds and can affect enemies only once. The elemental briefly grants sight around its trajectory as it travels.

0.text: Innate: Ornn increases his  bonus armor,  bonus magic resistance and  bonus health by 10% from all sources, further increased by 4% each time he upgrades a Mythic item into a Masterwork item.
0.html: Innate: Ornn increases his  bonus armor,  bonus magic resistance and  bonus health by 10% from all sources, further increased by 4% each time he upgrades a Mythic item into a Masterwork item.

Forging takes 4 seconds and the process is  interrupted if Ornn takes damage from enemy  champions or  turrets, disabling Living Forge for a few seconds.  Gold is only expended upon completing the forge.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+80 health
+6 health per 5 seconds

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Focus: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.
Unique – Endure: After taking damage from a champion or large monster, gain health regeneration equal to 0 − 40 (based on current missing health) health over 8 seconds. Reduced to 66% effectiveness on ranged champions or when triggered by AoE, DoT or proc effects.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – FOCUS: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.

Regenerates 5 health every 0.5 seconds over 15 seconds, restoring a total of 150 health.

Keywords

  • red

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+20 ability haste
+450 health
+35 armor
+35 magic resistance

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Immolate: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal 12 − 30 (based on level) (+ 1% bonus health) magic damage every second to enemies within 325 (+ 100% bonus size) units, increased by 25% against minions and 150% against monsters. This executes minions that would be killed by one more tick of damage. Damaging enemy champions or epic monsters with this effect grants a stack for 5 seconds, increasing subsequent Immolate damage by 10%, stacking up to 6 times for a 60% increase.
Unique – Flametouch: At maximum stacks, your basic attacks create an explosion around you, applying a burn to all nearby enemies that deals your current Immolate damage to them over 3 seconds.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5% tenacity, 50 bonus health and 5% slow resist.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – IMMOLATE: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal 12 − 30 (based on level) (+ 1% bonus health) magic damage every second to enemies within  325 (+ 100% bonus size) units, increased by 25% against minions and 150% against monsters. This executes minions that would be killed by one more tick of damage. Damaging enemy champions or epic monsters with this effect grants a stack for 5 seconds, increasing subsequent Immolate damage by 10%, stacking up to 6 times for a 60% increase.

1.originHTML: +  +  800

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Awe: Grants bonus health equal to 8% maximum mana.
Unique – Mana Charge: Grants a charge every 8 seconds, up to 4 charges. Consumes a charge on-hit and whenever affecting an enemy or ally with an ability to grant 3 bonus mana, increased to 6 for champion targets, up to a maximum of 360 bonus mana.
Transforms into Fimbulwinter at +360 mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – AWE: Grants bonus health equal to 8% maximum mana.

1.originHTML: +  +  +  1100

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Thorns: When struck by a basic attack on-hit, deal 10 (+ 20% bonus armor) magic damage to the attacker and, if they are a champion, inflict them with 25% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds. Immobilizing enemy champions also inflicts them with 40% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – THORNS: When struck by a basic attack on-hit, deal 10 (+ 20% bonus armor) magic damage to the attacker and, if they are a champion, inflict them with 25%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds. Stats

+20 armor
+45 movement speed

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique: Reduces incoming damage from all basic attacks by 12% (excluding turret attacks).
passive.originText: UNIQUE: Reduces incoming damage from all basic attacks by 12% (excluding turret attacks).

1.originHTML: +  +  500

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • ninja tabi

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+15 ability haste
+350 health
+500 mana

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Awe: Grants bonus health equal to 8% maximum mana.
Unique – Mana Charge: Grants a charge every 8 seconds, up to 4 charges. Consumes a charge on-hit and whenever affecting an enemy or ally with an ability to grant 3 bonus mana, increased to 6 for champion targets, up to a maximum of 360 bonus mana.
Transforms into Fimbulwinter at +360 mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – AWE: Grants bonus health equal to 8% maximum mana.

1.originHTML: +  +  +  1100

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+350 health
+60 armor

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Thorns: When struck by a basic attack on-hit, deal 10 (+ 20% bonus armor) magic damage to the attacker and, if they are a champion, inflict them with 25% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds. Immobilizing enemy champions also inflicts them with 40% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – THORNS: When struck by a basic attack on-hit, deal 10 (+ 20% bonus armor) magic damage to the attacker and, if they are a champion, inflict them with 25%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.  Immobilizing enemy champions also inflicts them with 40%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.

1.originHTML: +  +  1000

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+15 ability haste
+60 armor
+60 magic resistance

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Monolith: Gain a shield for 100 (+ 90% bonus health), decaying over 2.5 seconds, and 25% increased size while active (90 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – MONOLITH: Gain a  shield for 100 (+ 90% bonus health), decaying over 2.5 seconds, and 25% increased size while active (90 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Fortify: Increase your bonus armor and bonus magic resistance by 5% for 6 seconds when a champion deals damage to you, stacks up to 5 times for a maximum of 25%. This stacks once per unique champion.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – FORTIFY: Increase your bonus armor and bonus magic resistance by 5% for 6 seconds when a champion deals damage to you, stacks up to 5 times for a maximum of 25%. This stacks once per unique champion.

1.originHTML: +  +  +  1050

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+20 ability haste
+400 mana
+80 armor

passive.originHTML:
Aura

Unique – Winter's Caress: Cripples the attack speed of nearby enemies by 20% (700 radius).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – WINTER'S CARESS:  Cripples the attack speed of nearby enemies by 20% (700 radius).

1.originHTML: +  +  600

Keywords

  • fh

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+10 ability haste
+800 health
+200% base health regeneration

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique: Grants Warmog's Heart if you have at least 1100 bonus health.
Unique – Warmog's Heart: Regenerate 「 2.5% maximum health every 0.5 seconds 」「 25% maximum health every 5 seconds 」 if damage has not been taken in the last 6 seconds (3 seconds for damage from non-champions).
passive.originText: UNIQUE: Grants WARMOG'S HEART if you have at least 1100 bonus health.

st_flatStats2.concerningText: Active: Ornn sounds his horn over the cast time, summoning a lava elemental at maximum range from the target direction that stampedes towards his casting position at increasing speed. The elemental deals magic damage to enemies it passes through and  slows them for 2 seconds, with the  slow scaling with the distance travelled, down to a minimum of 10%.
